txt.en: You turn the pages and come to an account of the imprisonment of Laerdan in the tower of Sammath Baul. It is grim reading, drawn as it is from the account of his keepers.
You think about what you have read and ponder the actions of the servants of Angmar.
You turn the pages and become immersed in the chronicle of 'The Prisoner of Sammath Baul.'
Chronicle: The Prisoner of Sammath Baul
You have chosen to read from the Chronicle of Events concerning the curious imprisonment of Laerdan in Sammath Baul.
